allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Bolt v4/v5 protocol support for Neo4j 2025.x

Key changes:
- Add BoltProtocolV4 module with LOGON, LOGOFF, TELEMETRY, ROUTE support
- Update Metadata struct with v4/v5 fields \(db, mode, imp_user, notifications\)
- Add explicit PULL/DISCARD handlers with n and qid parameters
- Add HELLO with bolt_agent for v5+
- Fix timeout protection \(change from :infinity to 30s default\)
- Add v4.3+ guard for ROUTE message
- Fix neo4j:// scheme detection for routing
- Update v5 negotiation to prefer 5.6 and skip unused 5.5
- Add connection hints processing from HELLO response
- Improve error recovery with comprehensive RESET
- Add ConnectionHealth module for circuit breaker and retry logic
- Add comprehensive test coverage for v4 and v5 encoders
EOF
\)")
